title: 'Roseanne' star says revived show reflects Trump's America
text:
'Roseanne' star says revived show reflects Trump's America Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:16 
The March revival of “Roseanne” will show how a politically divided, working-class American family grapples with daily life and challenges after the election of U.S. President Donald Trump, the show’s stars said on Monday.
